C

changeDirection() - Method in class BubbleBobble.model.Monster
Gives the monster a 20% chance of changing direction.
changeLevel(int) - Method in class BubbleBobble.LevelComponent
Updates the current level index based on a command: command = 1 is increment the level by one. command = -1 is decrement the level by one. command = 0 is load the main menu. command = NUM_LEVELS is loads the game over screen Levels will loop through levels 1-9 when scrolling through with 'u' and 'd'.

Pauses all of the collidable objects in the level.

Changes the direction of the hero's sprite based on its current movement direction.
changeSpriteDirection() - Method in class BubbleBobble.model.Monster
Changes the sprite direction based on the monster's current movement direction.

checkHeroStatus() - Method in class BubbleBobble.controller.GameController
Checks the hero's current status (e.g., invincibility) and sets the appropriate action strategy.
Collidable - Class in BubbleBobble.model
The Collidable class is the superclass for all "collidable" objects in the game.
